Discrete Mathematics

Logical Operators

DM
Jan 17, 2020

Operations performed on one or more Proposition to create new Proposition.

Biconditional

DM
Jan 16, 2020

For two Proposition p and q, Compound Propositions $p \leftrightarrow q$ is true when both both p and q have same Truth Value false otherwise.

Conditional Statement

DM
Jan 15, 2020

Proposition $p \to q$ pronounced as "if p then q" is false when p is true and q is false and true otherwise.

Inverse

DM
Jan 14, 2020

For proposition $p \to q$, inverse will be $\neg p \to \neg q$.

Contrapositive

DM
Jan 13, 2020

For proposition $p \to q$, contrapositive will be $\neg q \to \neg p$.

Equivalent

DM
Jan 12, 2020

When two Compound Propositions have same Truth Value.

Converse

DM
Jan 11, 2020

For proposition $p \to q$, converse will be $q \to p$.

Exclusive OR

DM
Jan 10, 2020

When either p or q can be true. But in order to satisfy the Proposition both can't be true at same time.

Inclusive OR

DM
Jan 9, 2020

When either p or q and even both can be true to satisfy the Proposition.

Disjunction

DM
Jan 8, 2020

Let p and q be two Proposition. Then disjunction of these two will be $p \vee q$.

Conjunction

DM
Jan 7, 2020

Let p and q be two Proposition. Then $p \wedge q$ will be the conjunction of both.

Truth Table

DM
Jan 6, 2020

Table containing all possible Truth Value of a Proposition.
